Body:
range_ = Range(0, 10)
choices = [12, 15]
oneof = OneOf(choices=choices)
when = When({'equal_to': 'world'}, when_vos=[{'value': 'hello'}],
    then_validators=[range_], otherwise_validators=[oneof])
when(12)
with pytest.raises(ValidationError):
    when(3)
when = When({'equal_to': 'hello'}, when_vos=[{'value': 'hello'}],
    then_validators=[range_], otherwise_validators=[oneof])
when(3)
with pytest.raises(ValidationError):
    when(12)
assert when.grid() == list(range(10 + 1))
